title: How do I view my phone's data service status or disable the data service?
answer:
Flick down from the status bar to open the notification panel. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111086) indicates that the mobile network is turned on. To turn off the mobile network, touch this icon to make it become ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111087). 

 [![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111088) indicates that the mobile network is turned off. To turn on the mobile network, touch this icon to make it become ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111089).]()
